title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: Analyzing the Impact of Physical Environments in Collaborative Problem Solving: Multimodal Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze changes in participation when collaborating to solve problems in various physical environments (circular/rectangular tables).
Learners can measure differences in physical interactions (distance, range of movement) based on group size (4 vs. 6 members) and propose optimal collaboration conditions.
Learners can visualize and interpret collaboration patterns using multimodal learning analytics tools (motion capture, video data).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
